entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
